user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot displays an Amazon shopping cart. It includes items such as an LG UltraGear 24" Gaming Monitor priced at $199.99 and a MacBook Pro 13 Case priced at $19.80. The search bar at the top suggests previous searches for "LG UltraGear," "MacBook Pro 13 inch," and "Razer Blackwidow." There are options to delete, save for later, or compare with similar items, and a button to proceed to checkout with two items in the cart.
